property.filterExpression: w4ncert=='1.0' & !(vstatus=='inactive') & #APG:ALL & datatype=='Block' & !(devtype=='VirtualStorage') & parttype=='Service Level' & !(svclevel=='Pool Contributor') & !(svclevel=='System Resource')

property.description: The Service Level definitions can be customized under Centralized Management > Groups Management > Service Level by LUNs. Select an existing service level to modify the service level definition and changes will be seen in a day.

property.name: Service Level
property.description: Name of Service Level.

property.name: Usable (GB)
property.description: Raw Capacity for the service level across Arrays.

property.name: Used (GB)
property.description: Used Capacity for the service level across Arrays.

property.name: Used Trend
property.description: Used Capacity over last 3 months.

property.name: Free (GB)
property.description: Free Capacity for the service level across Arrays.

property.name: % Used
property.description: Percentage of service level capacity that is used.

property.name: Array
property.description: Name of the array.

property.name: Serial Number
property.description: The serial number of the array.

property.name: Vendor
property.description: The vendor name of the array.

property.name: Array Model
property.description: Vendor-specified name for the storage model within a product line.

property.name: Firmware
property.description: Vendor-specified version for the storage firmware.

property.name: Service Level
property.description: Name of Service Level.

property.name: Service Level Usable (GB)
property.description: Service Level capacity that is available for data storage.

property.name: Service Level Used (GB)
property.description: Written space within pools, mapped and masked thick LUNs, including local and remote copies.

property.name: Service Level Free (GB)
property.description: Service Level free capacity.

property.name: Service Level Used Trend
property.description: Trend of service level used capacity.

property.name: % Service Level Used
property.description: Percentage of service level capacity that is used.

property.name: Array
property.description: Name of the array.

property.description: The serial number of the array.

property.description: This report shows active alerts consolidated from various sources.
The severity of the alert, (CRITICAL, MAJOR, MINOR, UNKNOWN, INFORMATIONAL, OK).

property.name: Severity
property.description: The severity of the alert, (CRITICAL, MAJOR, MINOR, UNKNOWN, INFORMATIONAL, OK).

property.name: Ack?
property.description: A YES (1) value indicates that the alert has been acknowledged by a user.

property.name: Owner
property.description: The current owner of the alert.

property.name: Component Type
property.description: The component type that the alert occurred on.

property.name: Component
property.description: The component that the alert occurred on.

property.name: Name
property.description: The name of the alert.

property.name: Source
property.description: The source of the alert.

property.name: Device
property.description: The device that the alert occurred on.

property.name: Device Type
property.description: The device type that the alert occurred on.

property.name: Created At
property.description: The date and time when the alert first occurs.

property.name: Type
property.description: The type of alert, (MOMENTARY, DURABLE).

property.name: Active?
property.description: A YES (1) value indicates this alert is currently active on the system.

property.name: Category
property.description: The category of the alert.

property.name: Closed At
property.description: The date-time when the alert was closed.

property.name: Count
property.description: Shows how many times an alert has occurred.

property.name: Duration
property.description: The duration between when the alert was ACTIVE to INACTIVE.

property.name: ID
property.description: The ID of the alert occurrence as it exists in the database.

property.name: Last Changed At
property.description: The date and time when an alert was last updated.

property.name: Message
property.description: A message used to describe more information about the alert.

property.name: Problem?
property.description: A YES (1) value indicates this alert was discovered via Codebook Correlation.

property.name: Root?
property.description: A YES (1) value indicates this alert is has no known deeper underlying cause.

property.name: State
property.description: The current state of the alert, (ACTIVE or INACTIVE).

property.name: System Defined 1
property.description: A custom field that is reserved for M&R Platform and SolutionPack use.

property.name: System Defined 2
property.description: A custom field that is reserved for M&R Platform and SolutionPack use.

property.name: System Defined 3
property.description: A custom field that is reserved for M&R Platform and SolutionPack use.

property.name: System Defined 4
property.description: A custom field that is reserved for M&R Platform and SolutionPack use.

property.name: System Defined 5
property.description: A custom field that is reserved for M&R Platform and SolutionPack use.

property.name: Platform
property.description: A custom field that is used for Device Grouping.

property.name: Customer
property.description: A custom field that is used for Customer groups.

property.name: Location
property.description: A custom field that is used for Location groups.

property.name: Business Unit
property.description: A custom field that is used for Business unit groups.

property.name: Text
property.description: A description of the alert.

property.name: Trouble Ticket Id
property.description: The ID of this alerting in an external ticket management system.

property.name: User Defined 1
property.description: A custom field that can be modified by the system administrator.

property.name: User Defined 2
property.description: A custom field that can be modified by the system administrator.

property.name: User Defined 3
property.description: A custom field that can be modified by the system administrator.

property.name: User Defined 4
property.description: A custom field that can be modified by the system administrator.

property.name: User Defined 5
property.description: A custom field that can be modified by the system administrator.

property.name: User Defined 6
property.description: A custom field that can be modified by the system administrator.

property.name: User Defined 7
property.description: A custom field that can be modified by the system administrator.

property.description: A custom field that can be modified by the system administrator.

property.description: A custom field that can be modified by the system administrator.

property.description: A custom field that can be modified by the system administrator.

property.description: A custom field that can be modified by the system administrator.

property.name: User Defined 19
property.description: A custom field that can be modified by the system administrator.

property.name: User Defined 20
property.description: A custom field that can be modified by the system administrator.

property.name: SeverityForRowColor
property.description: A value used to set the table row colors based on the severity of the alert.

node.name: Alert Details Expansion On Alert Name

node.name: Alert Details Expansion On Alert Name

property.displayedProperties: acknowledged[Acknowledged?] active[Active?] category[Category] closedat[Closed At] device[Device] devtype[Device Type] duration[Duration] id[ID] lastchangedat[Last Changed At] fullmsg[Message] owner[Owner] severityAsString[Severity] eventSource[Source] eventstate[State] eventtext[Text]
property.description: This report display all of the attributes of a selected alert.

property.name: Severity
property.description: The severity of the alert, (CRITICAL, MAJOR, MINOR, UNKNOWN, INFORMATIONAL, OK).

property.name: Component Type
property.description: The component type that the alert occurred on.

property.name: Component
property.description: The component that the alert occurred on.

property.name: Name
property.description: The name of the alert.

property.name: Type
property.description: The type of alert, (MOMENTARY, DURABLE).

property.name: Created At
property.description: The date and time when the alert first occurs.

property.filterExpression: #APG:ALL & (devtype=='Array' | devtype=='UnifiedArray' | devtype=='VirtualStorage' | devtype=='FileServer') & (datatype=='Block' | datatype=='File' | datatype=='Virtual' | datatype=='Object')

w4ncert=='1.0' & #APG:ALL & !(vstatus=='inactive') & source=='Chargeback-block-processor' & devtype=='UserDefinedGroup' & (name='Used%' | name='Presented%') & !(device=='All Hypervisors') & !(device=='All Physical Hosts') & !(device=='All VM Guests') & !(device=='Provider Tenant')

property.name: Group
property.description: Name of the group.

property.name: Primary Presented Chargeable
property.description: The Primary used Chargeable Capacity for the host deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Primary Used Chargeable
property.description: The Primary used Chargeable Capacity for the host deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.filterExpression: (name=='ReadThroughput' | name=='WriteThroughput' | name=='UsedChargeableCapacity') & w4ncert=='1.0' & !(vstatus=='inactive') & #APG:ALL & (devtype=='Host' | devtype=='Hypervisor' | devtype=='VirtualMachine' | devtype=='PassiveHost')

property.name: Host
property.description: Name of the Host.

property.name: Host Type
property.description: Type of host; values can be - Host, Hypervisor, PassiveHost, Virtual machine.

property.name: VM Profile
property.description: Values are 'VM' or 'HMS VM'.

property.name: IP
property.description: The IP address of the host.

property.name: Platinum
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Platinum service level.

property.name: Gold
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Gold service level.

property.name: Silver
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Silver service level.

property.name: Bronze
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Bronze service level.

property.name: Fast VP
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Fast VP service level.

property.name: Virtual Storage
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Virtual Storage service level.

property.name: VVol
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for the VVOL service level.

property.name: Other
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Other service level.

property.name: Primary Used Chargeable
property.description: Used Capacity divided by the number of distinct Virtual Machines sharing that LUN.

property.name: Primary Used
property.description: Minimum of Used versus Presented capacities for all primary LUNs for RDMs of the given host plus VMDK file capacities. For virtualized capacity, Primary Used is the total capacity of the Virtual Volumes presented as RDMs plus VMDK file capacities.
For the capacity to be assigned to a service-level, the LUN providing the storage must be monitored (in the last 24h)

property.name: Host Device
property.description: WWN or name of the Disk.

property.name: Disk
property.description: Name of the Disk.

property.name: WWN
property.description: The world wide number of the LUN.
For the capacity to be assigned to a service-level, the LUN providing the storage must be monitored (in the last 24h)

property.name: Disk
property.description: Name of the Disk.

property.name: WWN
property.description: The world wide number of the LUN.

property.filterExpression: w4ncert=='1.0' & #APG:ALL & !(vstatus=='inactive') & source=='Chargeback-block-processor' & devtype=='UserDefinedGroup' & (name='Used%' | name='Presented%') & !(device=='All Hypervisors') & !(device=='All Physical Hosts') & !(device=='All VM Guests') & !(device=='Provider Tenant')

property.name: Group
property.description: Name of the group.

property.name: Host Type
property.description: Type of host; values can be - Host, Hypervisor, PassiveHost, Virtual machine.

property.name: Platinum
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Platinum service level.

property.name: Gold
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Gold service level.

property.name: Silver
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Silver service level.

property.name: Bronze
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Bronze service level.

property.name: Fast VP
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Fast VP service level.

property.name: Virtual Storage
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Virtual Storage service level.

property.name: VVol
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for the VVOL service level.

property.name: Other
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Other service level.

property.name: Primary Used Chargeable
property.description: The Primary used Chargeable Capacity for the host deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Primary Used
property.description: The actual Capacity that is used by the host.

property.name: Chargeable Cost ($)
property.description: The Chargeable cost for the host based on primary used chargeable capacity. Its deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Non-Chargeable Cost ($)
property.description: The actual cost for the host which is based on primary used capacity.

property.name: Last Timestamp
property.description: The most recent date/time that this key performance indicator has been collected.

property.filterExpression: name='Used%' & source=='Chargeback-block-processor' & w4ncert=='1.0' & !(vstatus=='inactive') & #APG:ALL & (devtype=='Host' | devtype=='Hypervisor' | devtype=='VirtualMachine' | devtype=='PassiveHost')

property.name: Host
property.description: Name of the Host.

property.name: Host Type
property.description: Type of host; values can be - Host, Hypervisor, PassiveHost, Virtual machine.

property.name: VM Profile
property.description: Values are 'VM' or 'HMS VM'.

property.name: IP
property.description: The IP address of the host.

property.name: Platinum
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Platinum service level.

property.name: Gold
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Gold service level.

property.name: Silver
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Silver service level.

property.name: Bronze
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Bronze service level.

property.name: Fast VP
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Fast VP service level.

property.name: Virtual Storage
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Virtual Storage service level.

property.name: VVol
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for the VVOL service level.

property.name: Other
property.description: Primary Used Chargeable capacity for Other service level.

property.name: Primary Used Chargeable
property.description: Used Capacity divided by the number of distinct Virtual Machines sharing that LUN.

property.name: Primary Used
property.description: Minimum of Used versus Presented capacities for all primary LUNs for RDMs of the given host plus VMDK file capacities. For virtualized capacity, Primary Used is the total capacity of the Virtual Volumes presented as RDMs plus VMDK file capacities.

property.name: Chargeable Cost ($)
property.description: The Chargeable cost for the host based on Primary Used chargeable capacity. Its deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Non-Chargeable Cost ($)
property.description: The actual cost for the host which is based on Primary Used capacity.

property.name: Last Timestamp
property.description: The most recent date/time that this key performance indicator has been collected.

property.name: Group
property.description: Name of the group.

property.name: Host Type
property.description: Type of host; values can be - Host, Hypervisor, PassiveHost, Virtual machine.

property.name: Platinum
property.description: Primary Presented Chargeable capacity for Platinum service level.

property.name: Gold
property.description: Primary Presented Chargeable capacity for Gold service level.

property.name: Silver
property.description: Primary Presented Chargeable capacity for Silver service level.

property.name: Bronze
property.description: Primary Presented Chargeable capacity for Bronze service level.

property.name: Fast VP
property.description: Primary Presented Chargeable capacity for Fast VP service level.

property.name: Virtual Storage
property.description: Primary Presented Chargeable capacity for Virtual Storage service level.

property.name: VVol
property.description: Primary Presented Chargeable capacity for the VVOL service level.

property.name: Other
property.description: Primary Presented Chargeable capacity for Other service level.

property.name: Primary Presented Chargeable
property.description: The Chargeable Capacity for the host deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Primary Presented
property.description: Presented capacities for all primary LUNs attached to the given host. For virtualized capacity, Primary Presented is the total capacity of the Virtual Volumes presented to the given host.

property.name: Chargeable Cost ($)
property.description: The Chargeable cost for the host based on primary presented chargeable capacity. Its deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Non-Chargeable Cost ($)
property.description: The actual cost for the host which is based on primary presented capacity.

property.name: Last Timestamp
property.description: The most recent date/time that this key performance indicator has been collected.

property.filterExpression: name='Presented%' & source=='Chargeback-block-processor' & w4ncert=='1.0' & !(vstatus=='inactive') & #APG:ALL & (devtype=='Host' | devtype=='Hypervisor' | devtype=='VirtualMachine' | devtype=='PassiveHost')

property.name: Primary Presented
property.description: Presented capacities for all primary LUNs attached to the given host. For virtualized capacity, Primary Presented is the total capacity of the Virtual Volumes presented to the given host.

property.filterExpression: (#APG:ALL & w4ncert=='1.0' & !(vstatus=='inactive') | #EVENTS-GENERIC:ALL & eventstate=='ACTIVE' | #COMPLIANCE:ALL & state=='1') & #APG:ALL & purpose=='Primary' & ismapped=='1' & ismasked=='1' & parttype=='LUN'

property.description: This report shows Allocated LUNs with no or few I/O over the selected period.

property.name: Array
property.description: Name of the Storage System.

property.name: Model
property.description: Model of the Storage System.

property.name: Pool
property.description: Pool from which the LUN was created.

property.name: LUN
property.description: Name of the LUN

property.name: Type
property.description: Type of protection on the LUN.

property.name: Service Level
property.description: Service Level the LUN is tagged with.

property.name: Capacity
property.description: Capacity of the LUN.

property.name: Used
property.description: Used Capacity of the LUN.

property.name: Total IOPS
property.description: Total IOPS on the LUN.

property.name: $/GB
property.description: Cost per GB associated with the LUN.

property.name: Used Capacity Cost ($)
property.description: Cost associated with the LUN.

property.name: Connected Hosts
property.description: Host using the LUN. Populated only if SRM has discovered the Hosts (Physical or VMware).

property.name: ViPR Controller
property.description: ViPR Controller instance which manages this resource. Note: An empty value means that either the resource is not actively managed by ViPR Controller or the ViPR Controller instance is not monitored by SRM.

property.filterExpression: (#APG:ALL & w4ncert=='1.0' & !(vstatus=='inactive') | #EVENTS-GENERIC:ALL & eventstate=='ACTIVE' | #COMPLIANCE:ALL & state=='1') & #APG:ALL & purpose=='Primary' & ismapped=='1' & ismasked=='1' & parttype=='LUN'

(#APG:ALL & w4ncert=='1.0' & !(vstatus=='inactive') | #EVENTS-GENERIC:ALL & eventstate=='ACTIVE' | #COMPLIANCE:ALL & state=='1') & #APG:ALL & purpose=='Primary' & ismapped=='1' & ismasked=='1' & parttype=='LUN'
